title: Workshop on Sampling Techniques for Predicting Medical Appointment No-Shows

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistical knowledge and foundational understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining smartphone-based Learning Management System (LMS) utilization and face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Address imbalanced data issues in medical appointment datasets using sampling techniques
Apply and comparatively evaluate major sampling techniques such as ROS, SMOTE, and ENN to real-world data
Improve no-show prediction performance with a focus on recall using decision tree models

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
